author: Denise Chow
title: People often think with their gut. That's not ideal for a pandemic.
description: When people make decisions, psychologists have found, two main systems influence their thinking and decision-making: gut feelings and logical analysis. Human intuition, however, is not particularly well geared to a pandemic.
content:
When people make decisions, psychologists have found, two main systems influence their thinking and decision-making: gut feelings and logical analysis.
One is more immediate and based on intuition. The other is slower, more thoughtful and based on evidence.… [+5490 chars]
